channel.title: Day 3 schedule on Decision Modeling in R Workshop

item.title: Microsimulation models in R
item.description: Here you find all the files for the Microsimulation session. To avoid issued with directories, we recommend storing all files in one folder. Presentation video If you have time, please watch the microsimulation presentation video to get more prepared prior to tomorrow. link to video Slides MicrosimulationSlides.pdf Demostration microsim_3-state_time.Rmd Exercise worksheet microsim_sick-sicker_exercise.pdf Student exercise template Datasets for the exercise: mortProb_age.csv MyPopulation-AgeDistribution.csv Functions we use: Functions.R microsim_Sick-Sicker_time_template.Rmd Instructor solutions microsim_Sick-Sicker_time_solutions.Rmd
